title: FNaF Shooter

headings.text: Which animatronics are there in FnaF Shooter?
Can I play FNaF Shooter on my browser?
How do I switch weapons in the game?
How to walk backwards in FNaF shooter game?

controls: Mouse: Look aroundWASD: MoveW + Shift: RunLeft Mouse Button: ShootHold Right Mouse Button: AimMouse Wheel: Next/Leading weapon1-7: Weapon hotkeysR: ReloadF: Knife attackG: Throw grenadeT: Inspect weapon
content.howToPlay: In FNaF Shooter, your objective is to survive waves of animatronics as you explore mall at night.These enemies, recognizable from the FNaF universe, will keep coming at you.Use an array of weapons, from shotguns to grenades, to fend off them. In this big mall, check inside every shop, under counters, behind ATMs, and even inside the toilets. Find all the animatronics hiding. See how many animatronics are left on the map by checking on the top left. In first level, you need to clear 16 of them, but it'll gradually increase as you level up.If there's an animatronics nearby, you'll see red circles on the map on the top left. So check out the map often so as not to get caught flat-footed.  Remember to reload often and throw if multiple animatronics approach at the sam time. Even if you break their arm or legs, they will crawl over you! So aim for headshots!Danger lurks around every corner; have fun at the mall in an unusual way!

fullContent: Home› First Person ShooterFNaF ShooterBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenNo longer just hiding from the creepy animatronics. No more worrying if your flashlight's battery will die before you spend the night safe and sound. You have the weapons to fight them head-on now! FNaF Shooter is a 3D first-person shooter game where you must eliminate an army of animatronics in a mall. Inspired by the popular Five Nights at Freddy's (FNaF) series, this game puts a new twist on the horror franchise. Shoot 'em all and save the supermarket from haunted animatronics.ControlsMouse: Look aroundWASD: MoveW + Shift: RunLeft Mouse Button: ShootHold Right Mouse Button: AimMouse Wheel: Next/Leading weapon1-7: Weapon hotkeysR: ReloadF: Knife attackG: Throw grenadeT: Inspect weaponHow to Play FNAF ShooterIn FNaF Shooter, your objective is to survive waves of animatronics as you explore mall at night.These enemies, recognizable from the FNaF universe, will keep coming at you.Use an array of weapons, from shotguns to grenades, to fend off them. In this big mall, check inside every shop, under counters, behind ATMs, and even inside the toilets. Find all the animatronics hiding. See how many animatronics are left on the map by checking on the top left. In first level, you need to clear 16 of them, but it'll gradually increase as you level up.If there's an animatronics nearby, you'll see red circles on the map on the top left. So check out the map often so as not to get caught flat-footed.  Remember to reload often and throw if multiple animatronics approach at the sam time. Even if you break their arm or legs, they will crawl over you! So aim for headshots!Danger lurks around every corner; have fun at the mall in an unusual way!What is FNaF?The FNaF (Five Nights at Freddy's) series is a game series renowned for its horror theme. The original games take place in Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. In this haunted pizzeria, players control a night guard and try to survive from animatronics roaming at night. In FNaF shooter, Freddy Fazbear has expanded the business and opened a giant shopping mall named Pacific Palm Mall. But you have also more tools to fight them now. Arrange your loadout; it's up to you to stop them.Which animatronics are there in FnaF Shooter?You can encounter Freddy Fazbear, Bonnie and a few others as you progress through the game.Can I play FNaF Shooter on my browser?Yes, FNaF Shooter is playable on web browsers, making it easily accessible. You can also play te originals FNaF 1 and FNAF2 on OnlineGames.io for free.  How do I switch weapons in the game?You can switch weapons using the mouse wheel or the weapon hotkeys (1-7) for quick access to your arsenal.How to walk backwards in FNaF shooter game?While running away from animatronics, it's important not to turn your back on them. Walk backward by pressing S or down arrow key and keep shooting while running away. Check your health bar at the bottom left and stay safe.DeveloperGoGoMan developed FNaF Shooter.Release DateFnaF shooter was released on March 2022, and last updated in November 2023.More Horror GamesIf you enjoy the weird horror of FNaF Shooter or the thrill of first-person shooters, you'll find plenty of online horror games that test your nerves.This article was updated on October 7, 20243DActionBattleCrazyFirst Person ShooterFreeGunHorrorShootingUnityWeapon
